nodes.text: Short Round, also known as "Shorty" was Doctor Indiana Jones's assistant and sidekick. He accompanied him on a search for evidence of a creature called the Sasquatch (who was actually Chewbacca), said to live in a dense temperate rainforest. When Dr. Jones came across the wreckage of the Millennium Falcon, and the disconcertingly familiar Human remains within, they decided to leave Sasquatch as part of the "great unknown."
The character "Shorty" in "Into the Great Unknown" is obviously Short Round, the character played by Jonathan Ke Quan in Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom.
According to the official Indiana Jones website, Short Round's real name is Wan Li.
